name: com.castsoftware.aip.dashboard
title: CAST Engineering and Health dashboards
description: This package contains CAST Engineering and Health dashboards, plus the Rest API. The CAST Engineering Dashboard is the dashboard view for application team, Architects or Tech Leads that gives insights regarding potential risks � data integrity, stability, or potential bottlenecks - based on structural code practices. It will help to promote best practices thanks to education usage and architectural documentation for continuous improvement use case. The CAST Health Dashboard is the dashboard view of all the data surfaced through CAST AIP analysis and snapshot generation. This includes health factors, compliance scores, risk indicators, critical violation counts, technical sizing, all related statistics and also includes Function Points for sizing. The Health Dashboard provides visibility and measurement overview of IT development activities at all levels.
